channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gloucester Road worse road condition in Cheltenham, 22nd November
item.description:
Car bumps along entire carriageway along Gloucester Road from station to Christchurch terrace lots of bumps and potholes it’s SO bad . This entire road really needs sorting before accidents happen am aware there is a petition so why isn’t it being prioritised???
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to bike from bad road surface on Gloucester Road, 22nd November
item.description:
By the bus stop awful road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of broken glass, 21st November
item.description:
Outside number 41 Pilley Crescent. Possibly caused by the builders parked there? Very dangerous for animals. Please could it be cleaned up asap. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole and area around is on a bend and is getting a lot of traffic from residents and businesses, 21st November
item.description:
On a bend in our road opposite no 3 Faringdon Road The area around is also very badly worn

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Faringdon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive slurry and mud on track, 21st November
item.description:
There is an excessive amount of slurry and mud all over the track from Zoons Court Farmhouse down to the dual carriageway. It is a popular walk for many people but in its current state it is barely passable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Cabinet Graffiti, 21st November
item.description:
A green street cabinet at the junction of Hollis Road and Hatherley Road has been vandalised with graffiti. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 363, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
